Shovel.Description: A sturdy shovel for digging soil and moving earth. Essential for any serious gardener or treasure hunter.

Slingshot.Description: A simple but effective ranged weapon. Fires pebbles with surprising accuracy.

Watering Can.Description: A trusty watering can for hydrating plants. Keep your crops happy and healthy!

Peeble.Description: Small, smooth stones perfect for slingshot ammunition. Found almost everywhere.

Arrow.Description: Well-crafted arrows with sharp tips. Essential ammunition for the Cross Bow.

Hoe.Description: A farming tool used for tilling soil and preparing land for planting crops.

Cross Bow.Description: A powerful ranged weapon that fires arrows with great force and precision.

Black Shirt.Description: A simple black shirt. Stylish and versatile for any occasion.

Blue Shirt.Description: A comfortable blue shirt the color of the summer sky.

Brown Shirt.Description: An earthy brown shirt, perfect for blending in with nature.

Green Shirt.Description: A vibrant green shirt that reminds you of fresh spring leaves.

Orange Shirt.Description: A bright orange shirt that stands out in any crowd.

Purple Shirt.Description: A regal purple shirt fit for nobility or anyone with good taste.

Red Shirt.Description: A bold red shirt that shows confidence and passion.

Yellow Shirt.Description: A cheerful yellow shirt as bright as the morning sun.

Black Pants.Description: Classic black pants that go with everything. Timeless and practical.

Blue Pants.Description: Comfortable blue pants perfect for everyday adventures.

Brown Pants.Description: Durable brown pants ideal for outdoor activities and hard work.

Green Pants.Description: Vibrant green pants that blend well with forest surroundings.

Orange Pants.Description: Bright orange pants for those who like to stand out from the crowd.

Purple Pants.Description: Elegant purple pants with a touch of royal flair.

Red Pants.Description: Bold red pants that show confidence and energy.

Yellow Pants.Description: Cheerful yellow pants as bright as a sunny day.

Black Shoes.Description: Comfortable black shoes suitable for any occasion.

Blue Shoes.Description: Stylish blue shoes perfect for walking and light activities.

Brown Shoes.Description: Durable brown shoes great for outdoor adventures.

Green Shoes.Description: Vibrant green shoes that match well with nature.

Orange Shoes.Description: Bright orange shoes for those who want to make a statement.

Purple Shoes.Description: Elegant purple shoes with a unique and stylish look.

Red Shoes.Description: Bold red shoes that add energy to any outfit.

Yellow Shoes.Description: Cheerful yellow shoes as bright as sunshine.

Egg.Description: A fresh chicken egg. Perfect for cooking or eating raw if you're brave enough.

Milk.Description: Fresh milk from a happy cow. Nutritious and perfect for drinking or cooking.
